mapper.select: SELECT TRNSCDATE ,SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT /* 거래금액*/ FROM ( SELECT /* SQL_ID : AlctnClndMapper.stckClndSelect */ TO_CHAR(TRNSCDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRNSCDATE ,RTRIM(AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM TRANSACTION WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_DATE(TRNSCDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TRNSCDATE
